control.name: controlNavigator1
control.description: Use the NavigatableControl property to bind a desired control to a ControlNavigator. In this demo, a Grid Control is bound.

control.name: sbCollapse
control.description: The CollapseAllDetails method collapses all expanded master rows within the current View.

control.name: sbPreview
control.description: Displays the Print Preview window with a Ribbon UI.
